document_data.name: Xiltor
document_data.mainbody: '''Xiltor''' was a small city located in [[Veldorn]] in the [[Shining South]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dSWIc}}
document_data.Geography: Xiltor was located directly southeast of the [[Aerilpar Forest]] at the junction of the [[Liontongue River]] and the [[River Madras]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The city was ruled by a pair of [[beholder]] twins named [[Xaoch]] and [[Veoyh]]. Several tribes of [[kobold]]s, a large group of [[ogre]]s, and a [[black dragon]] named [[Kelpacitus]] also lived within the city.
